name: Zombie Warfare
description:
Zombie Warfare is a science fiction First Person Shooter that has 14 levels that will push your skills to the max with mazes that will challenge you as you fight your way past relentless zombies that wait for you around every turn.
Can You Survive?

Zombie Warfare requires DirectX 9c display drivers to play on your computer.

For your convenience you can download the drivers by downloading the dxwebsetup file.

JTC Gaming does not claim ownership of the drivers.

DirectX 9c is the sole property of the microsoft corporation.
